name: cypress-sample
description: Sample cypress project that integrates with qTest Automation Host's Universal Agent

scripts.cy:run: cross-env npm run delete:reports && node_modules/.bin/cypress run --browser chrome --reporter junit --reporter-options='mochaFile=reports/junit-report-[hash].xml,toConsole=true'
scripts.cy:run:selected: npm run delete:reports && node_modules/.bin/cypress run --browser chrome --reporter junit --reporter-options='mochaFile=reports/junit-report-[hash].xml,toConsole=true' --env tests='testruns_list.json'

author: Huy Nguyen
